analysis.key_quote: Don’t let civil servants become victims of police. We are here to serve and make it easy for all Americans. Treat us with dignity and give us our benefits back.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern for the treatment and rights of civil servants, emphasizing dignity and benefits, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule. It also hints at a broader concern about the influence of oligarchs, suggesting a fear of politicization.
